data.eml:eml: Two new species of Phyllodistomum Braun, 1899 (Trematoda: Gorgoderidae Looss, 1899) from Great Barrier Reef fishes

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ho, Hei Wa, Bray, Rodney A., Cutmore, Scott C., Ward, Selina, Cribb, Thomas H. (2014): Two new species of Phyllodistomum Braun, 1899 (Trematoda: Gorgoderidae Looss, 1899) from Great Barrier Reef fishes. Zootaxa 3779 (5): 551-562, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3779.5.5
